messages.message:
Hi. Reviewing the Converse endpoint API documentation (https://platform.instabase.com/docs/aihub/apis/api-reference/conversations/index.html#converse-with-a-document), a few questions as it appears the UI offers more features / options than leveraging the API -
• The Conversations endpoint does not support the multistep model --> Are multistep models only available via the UI then?
• No location tracking / reference of where information is for returned answer --> Is this location tracking (e.g. page numbers) again only available via the UI then?
Are such API design choices (limitations compared to the UI experience) specific to our aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com) MT environment or would they also exist on a customer specific ST environment?
